description: Tender poached pears make an easy and elegant winter dessert, perfect for slow cooking.
name: Slow Cooker Poached Pears Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium pears, cored and halved lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the sugar to the boil in a saucepan with 1 litre of water, cook, stirring, until the sugar has dissolved and the syrup is bubbling.
Pour the syrup into the slow cooker, add the cinnamon stick, clove and vanilla pod, place the pears in the syrup and cook on high for 5 hours with the lid on.
Whip the cream with a vanilla extract and serve with the poached pears and syrup.
